content.question: A. Describe TWO characteristics of the cultural landscape shown in Image 2. B. Explain how the spread of Islam from its culture hearth is an example of expansion diffusion. C. Explain how the global spatial pattern of Buddhism differs from the global spatial pattern of ethnic religions such as Judaism. D. Explain a likely economic effect of pilgrimages on the location shown in Image 2. E. Explain the degree to which religion may contribute to devolutionary pressures within the location shown in Image 1.

skill.text: Skill 4.E: Explain how maps, images, and landscapes illustrate, or relate to geographic principles, processes, and outcomes.
